# mgc_block_storage_backups (Resource)

Operations with backups for volumes.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "mgc_block_storage_backups" "backup" {
  name = "backup"
  volume = {
    id = mgc_block_storage_volume.volume.id
  }
}
```
